column1: # One annotation per line, multiple annotations per variant are concatenated when generating the summary TSV
# ; is used as a separator, so cannot be used in the annotation

column6: annotation

Present in the B lineage, which emerged in early 2020 and became the dominant viral strain [(WHO Report)](https://www.who.int/csr/don/31-december-2020-sars-cov2-variants/en/). It is in all B lineage strains (e.g. UK and SA variants)
Temporarily greatly increased in frequency in a patient undergoing convalescent antibody treatment [(Kemp et al. 2020)](https://www.medrxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.12.05.20241927v3)
Temporarily greatly increased in frequency in a patient undergoing convalescent antibody treatment [(Kemp et al. 2020)](https://www.medrxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.12.05.20241927v3)

Emerged alongside a H69/V70 deletion in a patient undergoing convalescent antibody treatment [(Kemp et al. 2020)](https://www.medrxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.12.05.20241927v3). It became the domiant strain upon initial emergence, dropped off and eventually increased to dominate again at the end of the case study

Temporarily emerged in a patient undergoing convalescent antibody treatment. It was in the dominant strain for a time, alongside  S T240I, nsp2 I513T, RdRp F157L and nsp15 N177S [(Kemp et al. 2020)](https://www.medrxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.12.05.20241927v3)

Temporarily emerged in a patient undergoing convalescent antibody treatment. It was in the dominant strain for a time, alongside S Y200H, nsp2 I513T, RdRp F157L and nsp15 N177S [(Kemp et al. 2020)](https://www.medrxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.12.05.20241927v3)

Temporarily emerged in a patient undergoing convalescent antibody treatment. It first emerged alongside RdRp F157L and became the dominant strain briefly, then receded and re-emerged to dominance, alongside S Y200H, S T240I, RdRp F157L and nsp15 N177S [(Kemp et al. 2020)](https://www.medrxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.12.05.20241927v3)

Temporarily emerged in a patient undergoing convalescent antibody treatment. It first emerged alongside nsp2 I513T and became the dominant strain briefly, then receded and re-emerged to dominance, alongside S Y200H, S T240I, nsp2 I513T, and nsp15 N177S [(Kemp et al. 2020)](https://www.medrxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.12.05.20241927v3)

Temporarily emerged in a patient undergoing convalescent antibody treatment. It was in the dominant strain for a time, alongside S Y200H, S T240I, nsp2 I513T and RdRp F157L [(Kemp et al. 2020)](https://www.medrxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.12.05.20241927v3)

Present in strain B.1.1.7, detected in the UK in December 2020 [(PHE Report)](https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/947048/Technical_Briefing_VOC_SH_NJL2_SH2.pdf)
